title: How to Change the Region on a Mac

steps.title: Click System Preferences.
steps.content: Click System Preferences . [1] X Expert Source Garnik Ovsepyan Computer Specialist Expert Interview. 1 July 2021.

steps.title: Click on Language & Region.
steps.content: Click on Language & Region . It's in the upper-center of the dialog box. [2] X Expert Source Garnik Ovsepyan Computer Specialist Expert Interview. 1 July 2021.

steps.title: Click on your Global region.
steps.content: Click on your Global region. Choose from Africa, the Americas, Asia, Europe or Oceania.

steps.title: Click on your country.
steps.content: Click on your country. [3] X Expert Source Garnik Ovsepyan Computer Specialist Expert Interview. 1 July 2021.

steps.title: Click on the red dot.
steps.content: Click on the red dot. It's in the upper-left corner of the dialog box. Your region has now been updated on your Mac.
